content.rendered:
Directed by Lesli Linka Glatter.

Written by Jim Atkinson. John Bloom. Joe Bob Briggs. David E. Kelley.

Cast Olivia Grace Applegate (Carol Crowder). Jesse Plemons (Allan Gore). Fabiola AndÃºjar (Mary Adams). Patrick Fugit (Pat Montgomery). Kira Pozehl (Elaine Williams). Christopher Corson (Church Congregant / …). Ryan Murphy (Collins County Sheriff / …). Harper Heath (Alisa Gore). Amelie Dallimore (Jenny Montgomery). Bonnie Gayle Sparks (Jo Ann Garlington). Sara Burke (Barbara Green). Jennifer Neala Page (Betty Huffhines). Richard C. Jones (Tom Cleckler). Aaron Jay Rome (Richard Garlington). Beth Broderick (Bertha Pomeroy). Andrew S Cortez (Cameraman). Vance Sparks (Dr. Lask). Veronica Berry (Cindy / …). D’Ann Connelly (Church Choir). Jackie Ritz (Celeste). Charlie Talbert (Lester Gayler). Drew Waters (Jerry McMahan). GiGi Erneta (News Anchor Melinda). Jason Alan Smith (Richard Parker). Ronald Joe Vasquez (Photographer). Patrick A. Grover (Reporter Jones). Siya (Business man / …). Lily Rabe (Betty Gore). Keir Gilchrist (Pastor Ron Adams). Elizabeth Marvel (Pastor Jackie Ponder). Tom Pelphrey (Don Crowder). Krysten Ritter (Sherry Cleckler). Brian d’Arcy James (Dr. Fred Fason). Mackenzie Astin (Tom O’Connell). Adam Cropper (Robert Udashen). Bruce McGill (Judge Tom Ryan). Deke Anderson (Dr. Vincent DiMaio). Eric Cepeda (Reporter Jenkins). Brad Leland (Chief Royce Abbott). Deborah Marcus (Choir Member). Rob Faubion (Collins County Sheriff). Asher Followell (Little Superman). Eleanor T. Threatt (Cindy). Max Juren (Gary). Justin Ross Martin (George). Jophielle Love (4yr Old Candy). Skeeta Jenkins (Security Guard). Brian Villalobos (Sid O’Hara). Joe Daru (Dr. Holden). Allison Poccia (Reporter). Curtis Simpson (Ups Guy). Kia J. Williams (Reporter Alexis). Tiana Stuart (Soloist). Angel Morales (Photographer). Laurie Jenkins Jones (Courtroom Spectator). Christin Sawyer Davis (Elaine Carpenter). Lisa Mattheis (Court Officer / …). Edward M Zihlman (Court room Deputy). Connor Denton (Church Congregant (uncredited)). Tanya Granato (Wylie PD Admin/Ep Assistant, Fair Goer, Shopper, Bar Patron, Movie Goer (uncredited)). Chantel Turner (Church Congregant (uncredited)). Bam Rubenstein (1972 Riviera Driver / … (uncredited)). Matt Harmatuk (Wylie Police Officer (uncredited)). David Lane Breaux (Church Congregate (uncredited)). Max Marks (Church Congerant (uncredited)). Jenny Biggs (Courtroom Artist (uncredited)). Ronnie Carl Jackson (Airport and Hotel Patron / … (uncredited)). Zachary White (Court Spectator / … (uncredited)). Dave Bodenbender (Church Congregant / … (uncredited)). Katherine Hogan (Church Congregant (uncredited)). Jesse L. Black (Church Congregant (uncredited)). Josh Brine (Shoe Salesman (uncredited)). Joe M Busch (Ti Employee (uncredited)). Ricky Trejo (Business Man / … (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Matthew Tinker. Scott Brown. Megan Creydt. Lesli Linka Glatter. David E. Kelley. Nicole Kidman. Michael Klick. Per Saari. Helen Verno.

Production Blossom Films. David E. Kelley Productions. Lionsgate Television.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status Finished (2023–2023)
